Description: Body sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos; white slip; interior glazed with traces of two added white bands at top; exterior: reserved with painted inscription.
Curator's comments: Many kantharoi Type B have painted inscriptions beneath the rim and several have been found on Aegina as well as at Naukratis (Williams 1983, 169). Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983
Bibliographic references: Cook & Woodhead 1952 / Painted Inscriptions on Chiot Pottery (p. 166, no. 46)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 718, no. 769)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1824) (phase 2)
